name: Worry's Investment Firm
description:
Mini-Jam 108

Frogs

Worry owes 1 million dollars and has two weeks to make it back! Help him invest his money in the stock market!

How to play:

  • Click the red/green buttons on the tickers on the left to buy or sell stocks
  • Buy low, sell high!
  • Newspapers and Croaker messages may give hints to how the market will behave
  • Have a total of 1 million assets/money after the 14th day to win!

If you enjoyed our game, come hang out in our discord for future game updates!

Team

  • SnagType Studio Team
  • Guest music from
    • Caoboy

Worry images inspired from the Worry Discord server
